Name: Harengon Sniper
Traits: Standing Leap. The harengon's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
Actions: Club. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. Light Crossbow. Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit (the target gains no benefit from less than total cover), range 320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. Hit or Miss: Immediately after making this attack, the harengon can use the Hide action.
